name: S_4_6_Manage_Public_Health_Information
title: S.4.6 Manage Public Health Information (Header)
description: Manage the PHR Account Holderâ€™s use of PHR-related Public Health Information and/or services.
purpose:
The PHR Account Holder (or the PHR Account Holder's Proxy) may desire to access certain public health information resources, enroll in certain public health programs, and/or participate in certain health surveys.

Example(s):
The PHR Account Holder may desire to receive a notification that a disease-specific survey will soon be conducted.
The PHR Account Holder may desire to access public health databases concerning possible water contaminants.
